function: When a person drinks the medicine, it solidifies their speech by firing a physical manifestation of the content. For say, if the person shouted 'Ya!', a corresponding Katakana letter 'Ya' (ヤ) will come out. Meanwhile, İf user shouts 'Ro' it will became an object shaped like "ロ". The letter's velocity is slightly slower than sound, and it does bounce off or be absorbed into hard surfaces and soft surfaces respectively (because their properties is rather similar to sound). The letters can maintain their velocity and momentum for a surprising amount of time and so may serve as transportation on their own.
appears_in: Flying Through the Sky on the Letter "ワ"
Move Fast, Doraemon! The Galactic Grandprix
Doraemon: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~
Doraemon: Nobita's Great Adventure in the Antarctic Kachi Kochi
